synopsis.text:
Yoshinobu Tokugawa's ship harbors a secret during Japan's tumultuous Bakumatsu era, as the legendary time-manipulating pocket watch "Jishingi" lies hidden within. Choshu samurai Shinsaku Takasugi and his ally Kogoro Katsura infiltrate the ship to seize the artifact, intending to destroy it to prevent its misuse. However, their plans are foiled when a mysterious woman in black steals the watch from their grasp.

With the future of their nation hanging in the balance, Takasugi and Katsura pursue the thief to Kyoto, only to find the government overthrown and the divine Susanoo ruling in its place. As they navigate the unfamiliar cityscape, they discover that the people and streets have drastically changed, yet their mission remains the same. Determined to save their country from those who seek to control time, the duo vows to reset the timeline and restore their homeland.

Meanwhile, a young woman is unexpectedly transported from modern-day Kyoto to the Bakumatsu era when a mysterious man gives her a pocket watch. Amidst the chaos of this new world, she finds herself falling in love with a man who promises to live for her, adding a tender romance to the thrilling time-travel adventure.
